channel.title: Making loop
channel.description: How would i make a skill loop... like for example.. mining.. make it mine over and over again and not stop til full inven? unlike just mine 1 ore then stops and u have to click again and mine another ore..

item.title: Making loop
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:4, topic:341529"][quote author=The Soul link=topic=437926.msg3218397#msg3218397 date=1274922281]
Declare a variable, preferably of the data type boolean, and set it to true once they click the rock. However you ‘process’ things, have a ‘while’ statement that checks if the variable is true then do the emote…i.e:

boolean mining = false; ... if(objectID == int) { mining = true; } ... while(mining) { setAnimation(int); }
[/quote]
Yeah cause let’s block the thread until we are done mining, that’s a great idea.[/quote]

Oh, you’re right. I completely forgot about that.

Read full topic
